notes.text:
An update is available for httpd, mod_http2, mod_md.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The httpd packages provide the Apache HTTP Server, a powerful, efficient, and extensible web server.

Security Fix(es):

* httpd: mod_session: NULL pointer dereference when parsing Cookie header (CVE-2021-26690)

* httpd: Unexpected URL matching with 'MergeSlashes OFF' (CVE-2021-30641)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Additional Changes:

For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.5 Release Notes linked from the References section.

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: Red Hat CSAF document for RHSA-2021:4257

document.title: Moderate: httpd:2.4 security, bug fix, and enhancement update
